title: How to Invite Someone to a Group on Telegram on an Android

steps.title: Look for the blue icon with a white paper airplane inside.
steps.content: Look for the blue icon with a white paper airplane inside. You’ll usually find it in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the group's name in your list.
steps.content: Tap the group's name in your list. This opens the conversation.

steps.title: Tap the group’s avatar or profile icon.
steps.content: Tap the group’s avatar or profile icon. It’s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: The Add member option appears on the menu.
steps.content: The Add member option appears on the menu.

steps.title: You'll see Invite to Group via Link at the top of the screen.
steps.content: You'll see Invite to Group via Link at the top of the screen. A menu will expand. If you’d prefer to invite people from your Telegram contacts list, you can select them from the list at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: This option opens a list of apps you can use to invite others to the group.
steps.content: This option opens a list of apps you can use to invite others to the group. You can now share the link in a message or post in any of these apps.

steps.title: Tap the app you want to use to share the link.
steps.content: Tap the app you want to use to share the link. For example, if you want to invite one of your Facebook Messenger contacts, tap Messenger .

steps.title: Use the selected app’s post or messaging tools to share the link to the group with friends.
steps.content: Use the selected app’s post or messaging tools to share the link to the group with friends. When someone follows the link, they’ll be given the option to join the group.
